root.name: Street Fighter Alpha: Warriors' Dreams
root.description: OverviewStreet Fighter Alpha: Warriors' Dreams, known as Street Fighter Zero in Japan. Is a fighting game developed and published by Capcom, and it was released in Japan on June 5, 1995, and in the United States on June 27, 1995. The game is available on Sega Saturn, Playstation, Gameboy Color and PC. The characters in the game are drawn in a anime style similiar to Darkstalkers which is also a 2D fighting game by Capcom. The game includes characters established in Street Fighter, Street Fighter II, and Final Fight.Street Fighter Alpha: Warrior's Dreams has also been released on the PlayStation Network as a downloadable game for both PS3 and PSP.CharactersStreet Fighter CharactersRyuKenBirdieAdonSagatStreet Fighter II CharactersChun-LiM. BisonAkumaFinal Fight CharactersGuySodomNew CharactersCharlieRoseDan
